organization: Suspilne (UA:PBC – Public Broadcasting Company of Ukraine)
background: Dmytro Tkachenko commissions Suspilne’s documentary slate, with a strong focus on Ukrainian national identity, conflict, and democratic resilience. He supports co-productions with European partners (EBU, IDFA, Docudays UA) and prioritises ethical storytelling rooted in the lived experience of Ukrainians.
thematic_priorities: Russia’s war against Ukraine and national resilience
content_not_wanted: Projects lacking Ukrainian perspective or public value
Sensationalist war content without ethical grounding
technical_requirements: Broadcast HD; subtitled for international distribution
current_calls: Docs on Ukrainian resilience and war impact
submission_process: Treatment in Ukrainian or English with public interest focus
name: Dmytro Tkachenko
